metadata.title: CVE-2019-14828 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle affecting 3.7 to 3.7.1, 3.6 to 3.6.5,3.5 to 3.5.7 and earlier unsupported versions, where users with thecapability to create courses were assigned as a teacher in those courses,regardless of whether they had the capability to be automatically assignedthat role.

criterions.comment: moodle package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
